title: Camille Nerf?
body: Well after camille was released, she was getting banned a lot. Her damage is too high and flashes are useless. You could run around and she would just q you then spam abilities. INSTA KILL. So yeh. Please nerf camille.

replies.body:
Huge mobility, gets a shield for a % of her max hp, does true damage which negates building resistances and does %HP damage which negates building HP to counter true damage, has a displacement ult that you can use like a Gragas ult to split a team up and the target cannot escape from except in very few interactions with other champs (stops Ekko and Vi R which went through Azirs wall) can jump over almost any wall in the game, oh and lets give her a ranged slow so she can peel chase while waiting for her enormous dash to come back up which also heals her for a % of her HP which is almost double Darius heal and isnt capped like his is. 

Did I forget anything?

Overall if they remove her %hp or her true damage that would give a build path vs her, atm there is none except Deaths Dance and Phantom Dancer which is not optimal for a lot of champs.
She actually has nerfs on the PBE to her Q and base AD, so.... yay.

Those camille nerfs got applied on the dec 13 hotfix, tooltip values wont be updated till 7.1

For instance the shaco update? ult still says 200 damage, take a 0 ap no masteries no runes shaco ult run it into a wave and kill it, it will do 300 damage not 200 (it got buffed to 300 to compensate his ap ratio nerf)

Still says 200? You realise shaco's patch was his ult base damage not its scale, cutting out 35% of his damage was already massive enough, considering that at the moment ad shaco is useless and ap shaco is also useless unless they managed to get ahead.

the ult base damages got buffed.

The e and q scales were nerfed.

Also yes they did release it in a hotfix i can even link it for you.

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-624-notes#patch-mid-patch-updates

Like i said the nerfs are already live, the tooltips arent.

On that note i also have 60% winrate with ap shaco mid over around 70 games atm, so far from useless imho.

Hell i adjusted my build to compensate for the nerfs the second i saw the update, thats the one thing people honestly dont realise about me.

I have insane game knowledge because im always checking the pbe, reading the wiki and making sure i know of every single last possible change that could affect me, im bronze because i cant cs for shit so despite having the ability to hard carry a game off my knowledge alone i usually dont get that lead i need to do it, till recently of course, hence the insane rise in winrate since last season, i made one simple tweak to make up for my lack of csing, i started roaming, and abusing my game knowledge and mechanics to force a lead even if i cant get ahead through normal means.


But thats all beside the point, the nerfs are already live, if people still feel she needs to be nerfed then she needs to be addressed further, granted i personally think she is fine as of now, there are most definitely stronger champions in the roster, shes just another yasuo, her numbers arent broken, its the insane utility of her kit.

Edit: Misread the change, was nerfed from 300 to 200, so there you go even ingame proof that its live. couldve sworn it did 200 prenerf though.
No yasuo's utility isnt broken or the problem, the problem is most people just outright refuse to learn his massive list of weaknesses and instead complain about his strengths.

His weaknesses are easy, dots stop his shield from being useful (i tend to run deathfire on him and hit him with spells just before shield is up to immediately bring it down again)

hes super susceptible to cc.

If he has no knockup comp mobility can destroy him from the sheer ability to dodge his q's

etc etc

his utility is the only reason hes strong, his double crit scaling, his windwall, his e dash, his mobility based shield, the ability to extend knockups, those are all utility.

if you took that away from him youd have a mediocre melee champion that can sometimes hit you from far away.

He also has the only dash in the game that is stopped by cc, all others (other than knockups as it overrides movement by default, stuns and snares have no effect) continue the dash, yasuo stops where ever he is when cc during dash. His utility becomes pretty useless when cc, his q doesn't actually do any damage and goes on full cd if you cc him during its cast. He has double crit not because its broken, because he would be really useless without it, say you have say Lucian, he doesn't need crit to do his job, all it does is make his job easier as a boost, while yasuo, crit is his sustained damage, without it his damage is unreliable and quite weak. His shield is only to make up for his low base health, his low base armor+scale and the fact he doesn't have a natural mr scale like most other melee champs. His W has a large cd and is his clutch save, without it he would still be more useless than a nasus who missed the first 10 minutes of a game.

If you took his utility away he wouldn't be "mediocre" he would be a dogs shit that every now and then stabs a minion and does a wind shit on minions, he wouldn't hit his q on champs because he needs his dashes, only way he would hit is q is if their enemy is afk.

Only dash?

hecarim e, fizz q, akali ult too ever tried ulting through a veigar stun? you most definitely stop dead in your tracks.

Infact i cant think of a single dash in the game that isnt not stopped by cc aside from shyvana ult.

Lol retard much? Veigar has a special stun if you read the tool tip it specifically states stopping all dashes on contact with the wall, before that added that feature in his miniature rework dashes continued through.

And I specifically mentions stuns and snares before, not general CC because knockups and their sub categories do stop stuns, I only mentioned cc as yasuo because any form of cc other than a slow stops his dashes altogether(even slows reduce the dashes speed by a further 50% for every 20% slowed). How many times have you stunned or rooted a maokai and still had him pop up on you? Hw may times you presses snare as morgana and hit the shen but he still went over the wall how many times have you had quinn knock you back that little and then burst you anyway because her e hit you even when you presses w as ryze how many times has leona gotten to your adc because your zyra snare hit but didn't snare how many times have you ulted a tristana and ashe but she still finished her jump. You can't go and use champion specific cases to prove a general point. A general dash and a general snare/root does not stop dashes, hecraim can have his e stopped because its a damn run not a dash, fizz q doesn't stop when you stun or snare him, this isn't a specific scenario when he is going through veigar's e this is general. A sion ult and q will stun the dashee because there is a knockup before the stun and knockups do override dashes stuns and snares do not, but knockups and knockbacks do. How many times did the old akali (because new has shit all burst) kill you after you desperately tried to snare her but she already used the dash and got to you? yea. too many. Do silences stop akali mid dash? no, Do snares? no, Do Stuns? no, do slows? no(slows donot stop yasuo but they drasticaly reduce his speed, meaning at 67.5% slow he would have been better off walking anyway), Does an ahri charm stop any champion other than a yasuo dash? no. Does blind stop any other dash? no (blind prevents him casing and planning the dash due to removing vision of the target, which he needs to cast the dash, but yes this is a special case and does affect similar dashes like maokai which require a target, but 80% of dashes are linear anyway. Disarms such as entangle stop his dashes and the other disarm Polymorph doesn't stop other dashes either, they finish the dash then get transformed, yasuo stops on the spot and becomes a squirrel. Fear, flee and taunt all allow the afflicted to continue their dash then the effect overrides movement, on yasuo this effect is instant and puts his dash on a 10 second cd. Suppression also stoops his dashes but not other dashes, thats why malzahard has the easiest time versus a yasuo rather than say akali because he can put yasuo on a 10 sec cd and prevent the entre dash movement while akali can either still move out of range after he casts or get close enough to him to burst him as soon as the effect ends, she is also able to cast her w at the end point in the middle of her dash as the supress has no effect on her until the dash is over. Every form of cc heavily affects yasuo's dash by either stopping or altogether, preventing its usage (silence stops and prevents it, nasty cc), or reducing the speed of the spell by so much it's faster to walk. Meanwhile the only cc that affect the dashes on other champs is only the airborne category of knockups and knockbacks. 

 TDLR; In champ specific cases like veigar yes the stun will stop dashes, only because it is champin specific, but in general dashes other than yasuo's e will not be stopped by a general stun or snare, the dash will continue its fully length and duration before applying that rooting effect, on the otherhand thing like blitzcrank or thresh q, or sion r do stun because they apply a knockup effect before the actual stun, and if you had any game knowledge you would know knockups override all dashes, while (non-special) stuns and snares do not stop any dash other than yasuo's.

As for that dash list.
Every champ in existence that dash a dash other than yasuo.

For special stun cases (ie. veig e)
Sion (ult is considered a run/dash, becomes cc immune)
Hecarim (Ult is unable to be stopped)
Malphite (Ult is unable to be stopped)
Shyvana (Ult is unable to be stopped after buff)

Maokai isnt a dash, its a blink, so assuming you let the cast animation go through the stun wouldnt do anything as its already been cast.

I think you need to have a read up on the differences between blinks and dahes, and the very small list of uninterruptible dashes (most of them are noted on the actual skill itself because its not common but there are a few that dont have that info listed)

Also re read veigar e http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Veigar it doesnt say anything about explicitly stopping dashes.

infact the only reference to dashes and blinks is where it says it doesnt affect blinks.

Again if theres any one thing you dont want to go against me on its game knowledge. Please have a read on the wiki of how all the skills work before your next reply.

Edit: i was mistaken maokai is infact a dash, but he also becomes untargetable during said dash so its literally impossible to actually hit him with cc mid dash.

If you want a way to visualise what i am saying instead of reading, get a friend to play lux, grab a bunch of champs with dashes and dash into her, unless the dash specifically says "cannot be stopped" they will get binded mid dash animation and stop moving.

Yasuo is not unique in that weakness.

Infact its the primary difference between a blink and a dash, a dash you can still cc them during the animation, a blink there is no animation so you cant cc them, its designed with that weakness in mind.
Talks himself up on game knowledge. Gets it wrong. Lololol

Literally the first thing you say it wrong, stop trying to sound intelligent the shit you spout does not help you.

The wiki version of the spell does not say the same as ingame but even still "KNOCK DOWN" that is the reason his stun stops you, it has a sub category of knockup, maybe you can't read, go back and read my posts. 

Here let me give you the first sentence of the tooltip for the knockdown

>Knock down only affects units that are airborne or performing a dash
>
>Knockdown and Ground only interrupt dash and blink abilities.

And please do your own test, watch how shen and trynd and all that continue their dashes at lux while yasuo gets stopped, go on.

Here is also a nice list of everything that roots prevent as an example
Interrupts: 
Stand United (Shen;Teleport)
Vault Breaker (Vi;Charge)
Sweeping Blade (Yasuo;Dash)
Elastic Slingshot (Zac;Charge)
Teleport
Hop (Gnar;Bounce)

And here is the list for stuns, just to prove it further.
Interrupts 
All channeled and charged abilities
Glacial Storm( Anivia ult) 
Sweeping Blade (Yasuo) 
Hop from bouncing (Gnar)
Centre of the universe (Aurelion Sol Stars)

You are literally contradicting the facts that are being smashed into your face with a mallet. Simple fact is yasuo has the only dash in the entire game that is stopped by all forms of cc, while all other forms of dash are only stopped by airborne effects and its subcategories.

Hey about about a cherry on top for you, Suppression
Interrupts: 
All channeled and charged abilities
Glacial Storm( Anivia ult) 
Sweeping Blade (Yasuo) 
Hop from bouncing (Gnar)
Centre of the universe (Aurelion Sol Stars)

Once again the only affected dash is, oh you probably didn't guess it, yasuo's e.

____

**And just a smack bam right in your face from riot.**

>Dashes grant immunity to non-airborne disables and will ignore the effects of these disables for the duration of the dash, but the target will be affected upon landing if the disable duration permits.

Even more wam ban from another person who isn't clouded by blind hate because they are bad

> [{quoted}](name=Kouga,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ftKneYox,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-06-01T03:25:52.727+0000)
>
> Few things at work here.
> 
> 1. Snare does not mean "Champion cannot ever move", it means "Champion cannot *control* their movement" - basically, they cannot choose a "movement" action or ability. Certain jumps/leaps and such, once they are already underway, will generally continue if rooted and they'll be rooted when they stop moving.
> 
> 2. Some dashes can be stopped - usually 'charged' dashes such as Zac's Slingshot or Vi's Vault Breaker. These are different than Channels, which they don't interrupt.
> 
> 3. Other dashes are *specifically* able to be stopped by CC, the only case currently being Yasuo's dash


If roots and stuns stopped dashes the game would be broken as simple as that, what the hell do you do if you are mid terrain and get w by ryze hmm? have to burn flash to be not stuck in wall wouldn't you. Yasuo is cc specific end of story, this doesn't happen with every champ
lol, they hotfixed those nerfs in 1 day after her release thats just extra

She does need a nerf in something, people who downvote are salty mains who think they've mastered the champ already. I'm all for one tricks but these people will either actually like playing her after the nerfs or will regret name changing and buying the skin.
